name: obsidian-plugin
description: A comprehensive toolkit that transforms educational content into intelligent, searchable knowledge bases. It processes PDFs, extracts annotations, generates AI-powered summaries from videos (with transcripts) and questions/answers, creates hierarchical course structures, and seamlessly integrates with popular tools like Obsidian and Anki for enhanced learning workflows. See details at https://github.com/danielshue/notebook-automation

scripts.version: node version-bump.mjs && git add manifest.json versions.json
scripts.rebuild: npm run clean && npm run build

author: Dan Shue
